messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}

{~L4}{~C3}Investigation stalled.{~N}]PTV] dealers still at large.{~N}{~N}Suspicious deaths continue.{~N}Like anti-drug Mayor,{~N}narcotics officer dies of{~N}sudden heart failure of{~N}unknown origin.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Fire broke out in town.{~N}6 homes destroyed.{~N}{~N}Charred body{~N}of Alessa Gillespie(7){~N}found in aftermath.{~N}{~N}Cause of fire currently under{~N}investigation.
{~L4}{~C3}Investigations show source{~N}as basement of Gillespie home.{~N}Blaze now believed caused by{~N}malfunction of antiquated{~N}boiler.{~E}
it's the same day{~N}we found Cheryl!{~E}
There's a place mark{~N}in the book..{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}WHITE CLAUDIA.{~N}{~N}Perennial herb found near water.{~N}Reaches height of 10 to 15 in.{~N}Oblong leaves, white blossoms.
{~L4}{~C3}Seeds contain hallucinogen.{~N}Ancient records show it was{~N}used for religious ceremonies.{~N}The hallucinogenic effect{~N}was key.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Ask doctor to let me quit being{~N}in charge of that patient.{~N}{~N}It's too weird.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}The room is filled with insects.{~N}{~N}Even with doors{~N}and windows shut{~N}they get in to spite me.{~N}{~N}To the hospital...{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Still alive,{~N}but with wounds that won't heal.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Blood and pus flow from{~N}the bathroom faucet.{~N}{~N}I try to stop it,{~N}but it won't turn off.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Feeling bad.{~N}Need to throw up.{~N}But nothing comes out.{~N}Vomiting only bile.{~E}
{~L4}{~C3}Told the doctor I quit.{~N}Won't work at that{~N}hospital anymore.{~E}
{~J2(3.8)}the blood and pus just start{~N}oozing through!
{~J1(6.4)}Everything is going{~N}according to plan.{~N}Sheltered in the womb.
{~J1(4.5)}Half the soul is lost.{~N}That is why the seed{~N}lies dormant.
{~J1(3.6)}And what soul remains{~N}captured in that husk,
{~J1(2.6)}Are you trying to say{~N}it won't work!?
{~J1(4.4)}If we lend a hand,{~N}we will be able to get power.
{~J1(5.4)}Never fear.{~N}The promise shall not be broken.
{~J1(5.0)}But the power we could{~N}draw now would be{~N}very weak; almost nothing.
{~J1(3.2)}Unless we get the other{~N}half of the soul...
{~J1(6.0)}Feeling this child's pain,{~N}it's sure to come.
{~J0(6.3)}I just want you to lend me{~N}a teeny bit of your power.{~N}That's all.
{~J1(5.8)}It will make everyone happy...{~N}and it's for your own good, too.
{~J1(4.3)}Oh, but mommy.{~N}I just want to be with you.
{~J1(7.1)}Oh, yes, I see...{~N}Maybe mommy has been wrong.
{~J1(5.3)}Why didn't I see this before?{~N}There's no reason to wait...
{~J1(7.2)}Herein lies the mother's womb,{~N}containing the power{~N}to create life.
{~J1(4.2)}I could have done it all myself.
There is a {~C2}Dagger of Melchior{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
There is a {~C2}Disk of Ouroboros{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The generator is working.{~N}Do you want to press the switch?{~S4}
The generator is stopped.{~N}Do you want to press the switch?{~S4}
The word, ]Bethor]{~N}is carved on the door.{~E}
The word, ]Aratron]{~N}is carved on the door.{~E}
Jelly beans.{~N}Do you want to open the bag?{~S4}
The chain is missing a link.{~E}
The chain is fixed{~N}with the ring.{~E}
There is a {~C2}Ring of contract{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
There is an {~C2}Amulet of Solomon{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
There is a {~C2}Crest of Mercury{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
{~C3}Names engraved{~N}On a lithograph.{~N}The Grim Reaper's list.
{~C3}Yes, the headcount is set{~N}Young and old lined up{~N}In order of age.
{~C3}Then, the pathway opens{~N}Awaiting them, the frenzied{~N}Uproar, the feast of death!{~E}
Electricity is flowing to the key.{~N}I'll get shocked if I grab it now.{~E}
A steel plate{~N}is screwed to the wall.{~E}
{~J1(4.0)}Why I'm still alive even{~N}though everyone else's dead.
{~J1(4.0)}I'm not the only one{~N}who's still walking around.
{~C3}thou possess them{~N}to guard thy spirit{~N}evoke five rites{~N}unveil thy fate{~E}
There's a severed power line.{~N}Nothing special here either.{~E}
The elevator doesn't{~N}appear to be working.{~E}
None of this stuff is of any use.{~E}
There are specimen of{~N}butterflies and moths{~N}hanging on the wall.{~E}
A girl's clothing hangs{~N}on the wall.
Six, maybe seven...{~N}Must be a kid about that age.{~E}
There are dolls on the floor.{~E}
A child's drawings are scattered{~N}on the floor.{~E}
There are old fairy tales,{~N}picture books of animals,{~N}and plants on the shelf.{~E}
None of this stuff is of any use.{~E}
There is a diary on the floor.{~E}
Looks like an altar.{~N}Wonder what they worship?{~E}
The floors and walls are covered{~N}with graffiti.{~E}
A body is laid out on the bed.{~N}Don't feel like checking this out.{~E}
There's a bottle filled{~N}with some kind of drug.{~N}Better leave it.{~E}
Nothing special in the box.{~N}Nothing to worry about.{~E}
There's a botanical{~N}reference book.{~N}Don't need to read it now.{~E}
